CmdLine: echo "INSTALLING OPENJDK 8..." &&     apk update && apk upgrade &&     apk add openjdk8 &&     mkdir /tmp/tmprt &&     cd /tmp/tmprt &&     apk add zip &&     unzip -q /usr/lib/jvm/default-jvm/jre/lib/rt.jar &&     apk add zip &&     zip -q -r /tmp/rt.zip . &&     apk del zip &&     cd /tmp &&     mv rt.zip /usr/lib/jvm/default-jvm/jre/lib/rt.jar &&     rm -rf /tmp/tmprt /var/cache/apk/* bin/jjs bin/keytool bin/orbd bin/pack200 bin/policytool           bin/rmid bin/rmiregistry bin/servertool bin/tnameserv bin/unpack200
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: echo "INSTALLING GIT AND NODEJS..."   && apk add --no-cache git bash openssh nodejs curl tar jq
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: echo "INSTALLING RANCHER-COMPOSE..."   && mkdir -p /usr/share/rancher-compose   && curl -fsSL https://github.com/rancher/rancher-compose/releases/download/v0.12.1/rancher-compose-linux-amd64-v0.12.1.tar.gz   | tar -xzC /usr/share/rancher-compose --strip-components=2   && ln -s /usr/share/rancher-compose/rancher-compose /usr/bin/rancher-compose
Commands.Name: run
